title: 91/20/EEC: Council Decision of 21 December 1990 concerning the provisional application of the Agreed Minute amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Czech and Slovak Federal Republic on trade in textile products
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 21 December 1990  concerning the provisional application of the Agreed Minute amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Czech and Slovak Federal Republic on trade in textile products  (91/20/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Sole Article  The Agreed Minute amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Czech and Slovak Federal Republic on trade in textile products shall be applied provisionally as from 15 November 1990 pending its formal conclusion,  provided that there is a reciprocal provisional application on the part of the contracting party.
The text of the Agreed Minute is attached to this Decision.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1990. For the Council
The President
A. RUBERTI   (1) OJ No L 287, 9. 10. 1987, p. 89.
ANNEX
